info.name: Sankalpam API
info.description: Collection for testing the Sankalpam REST API - Form submission for Hindu prayer vows

request.description:
Retrieve dropdown options for all Panchanga calendar fields.

Returns:
- Samvatsarams (60 year cycle)
- Ayanams (Uttarayanam/Dakshinayanam)
- Ruthus (6 seasons)
- Masams (12 months)
- Pakshams (Light/Dark fortnight)
- Tithis (lunar days)
- Vaasarams (days of week)
- Nakshatrams (27 birth stars)
- Rasis (12 zodiac signs)

request.description:
Submit a valid Sankalpam form.

Expected Response:
- Status: 201 Created
- Returns referenceId, submittedFor, and submittedAt timestamp

Required Fields:
- fullName, gotram, nakshatram, rasi
- samvatsaram, ayanam, ruthu, masam, paksham, tithi, vaasaram
- country, city, state
- sankalpaPurpose

Optional Fields:
- additionalNotes
- email (must be valid format)
- phone (must match E.164 format)

request.description:
Test phone number format validation.

Phone pattern: ^(\\+?[1-9]\\d{1,14})?$ (E.164 format)
Valid examples: +1-555-123-4567, +919876543210, 5551234567

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- Error: Invalid phone number format

item.name: 9. Submit Sankalpam - Sankalpa Purpose Too Short

request.description:
Test minimum length validation for Sankalpa purpose.

Requirement: Min 5 characters, Max 500 characters

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- Error: Sankalpa must be between 5 and 500 characters

Test handling of multiple validation errors.

Expected Response:
- Status: 422 Unprocessable Entity
- Error map containing messages for all invalid fields

Test malformed JSON error handling.

Expected Response:
- Status: 400 Bad Request
- Error: Request body is malformed or missing

Check application health status.

- Shows application status (UP/DOWN)

Get application information.
